name: Steamcraft2
tagline: SC2 is a UE add-on mod that adds Steampunk-themed power generation, blocks, items, and so much more.
body:
Steamcraft 2 - MC v1.6.4 ======================== A mod that extends Minecraft by adding post-apocalyptic, retro-futuristic blocks/items.
You are welcome to contribute to this mod, however, you will need to discuss things with me beforehand. Additionally, you will need to use the proper java code conventions in order to contribute.
These conventions can be located here: My Skype: johnny.eatmon
My Email: warlordjones' Skype: arona.jones warlordjones' Email: warlordjones@gmail.com
Power system update! ========================================== We are planning to make this mod compatible with RF (ThermalExpansion), EU (Industrialcraft2) and MJ (Buildcraft) but not UE power - similar to MFR. Stay tuned for more updates on our progress :) PlanetMinecraft ==========================================
Credits: - Proloe: for creating the first Steamcraft - moldywings: for his Minecraft mod models - ALinkToTheFuture: for use of his sprites - Papertazer: for coding support - warlordjones: Coder
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
